CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 5, 1959, pg. 2, reads: "Cited for Service - Outgoing NAACP Youth Council president, Wayne Holt, presents Certificate of Merit to, left to right: Youth Council member Farris Harris; former NAACP office secretary, Mrs. Louise Payne, and NAACP board member, Atty. Byrd R. Brown. Not shown is NAACP board member and youth adviser, Mrs. Churchill Carter, who received a certificate, also.  The awardees were cited for outstanding contributions to the community and to the NAACP. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: NAACP Youth Council President Wayne Holt presenting NAACP certificates of merit to Farris Harris, Louise Payne, and Byrd Brown, in church
CatSubject_tab: National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Brown, Byrd, 1929-
